name: tags_trending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool biztoc.
Tool description: Official BizToc.com API â€” The Web's most comprehensive hub for business & finance news.
API description: Get list of trending tags for `{page_id}`, sorted by popularity. The `{tag}` can be used for the **Tag/News** endpoint.

page_id.description: The ID of the page for which to retrieve trending tags.
